subject: JUnit 5 - extending
msgSnippet: Having had several months now with JUnit 5 in the context of a Fortune Ten company I really appreciate the work that was done with the life cycle. We have a
messageBody:
Having had several months now with JUnit 5 in the context of a Fortune Ten company I really appreciate the work that was done with the life cycle.


We have a fifteen minute QuickStart that demonstrates a fairly aggressive extension approach... and would appreciate any feedback from those that might have time or interest:


http://pedcentral.com/justify/justify-quickstart/ 


_Marvin
